Articles.Content:
So I've been playing 1.0 since yesterday, having 0 problems and a great time. I modified one of my designs to add a small boster stage (solid boosters fleas, then hammers..) Both overheated when I used them, so I took them back off and decided to just use the old method, w/o the solids.

Suddenly, the Thumpers I used before are overheating now. There's an array 4 of them, radially connected to the lf tank in the middle. Heat builds up VERY fast and they explode within 1km of the launchpads.

EDIT: Nevermind. Restarted the game, now no problems even when at max thrust. Huh.

Edited April 28, 2015 by rdwulfe
